Name: Councillor casework - case submitted - councillor notification
Output_template:
{"subject":"Case created - ({case_ref}) {subject}","fromName":"Councillor Portal","from":"noreply@brentwood.gov.uk","recipients_to":"{councillorEmailAddress}","recipients_cc":"","recipients_bcc":"","pdf_attachments":"","body":"

Hello Cllr {councillorSurname},

We've received your case and have assigned it to the {caseAssignedGroupDisplay} team to action.

You will receive a response by {taskDueDate}.

Category and service type:
{category} - {serviceType}

Subject:
{subject}

Tags:
{concatenatedTags}

Log into the Councillor Portal to track your case and view/add case notes.

Do not reply to this email as you will not receive a response.

Reference number:
{case_ref}
","attachments":""}

Name: Councillor casework - interested party 1 notification
Councillor casework - informed councillors - new case notification
Councillor casework - case assigned - officer notification (task creation)
Output_template:
{"subject":"Case assigned - ({case_ref}) {subject}","fromName":"Councillor Portal","from":"noreply@brentwood.gov.uk","recipients_to":"{caseAssignedGroup}","recipients_cc":"","recipients_bcc":"","pdf_attachments":"","body":"

Hello,

A councillor casework case has been assigned to your team to action.

@af:if({updateToAssignedServiceArea} != '')

The following update has been provided from the previously assigned team:

{updateToAssignedServiceArea}

@endaf:if

This task is due by {taskDueDate}.

Log into Dash to view and action your task.

Do not reply to this email as you will not receive a response.

Reference number:
{case_ref}
","attachments":""}

Name: Councillor casework - progress updates - record progress update
Output_template:
{"systemID":"591f0b36ca340","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"SELECT CONCAT( '{#progressUpdates}', '
', 'Case update', '
', '{#progressUpdate}', '
', '

', {current_datetime_h}, '

', '
' ) AS progressUpdates","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Output_template: {"systemID":"591f0b36ca340","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"SELECT \n\t{serviceAreaAssignedUsergroup} AS caseAssignedGroup,\n\t{selectAServiceArea} AS caseAssignedGroupDisplay","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: Councillor casework - case resolved email to Councillor (task creation)
Output_template:
{"subject":"Case resolved - ({case_ref}) {subject}","fromName":"Councillor Portal","from":"noreply@brentwood.gov.uk","recipients_to":"{councillorEmailAddress}","recipients_cc":"","recipients_bcc":"","pdf_attachments":"","body":"

Hello Cllr {councillorSurname},

The {caseAssignedGroupDisplay} team has marked your case {case_ref} as resolved.

Please find the case resolution notes below.

{caseResolutionNotes}

Category and service type:
{category} - {serviceType}

Subject:
{subject}

Tags:
{concatenatedTags}

This task is due by {taskDueDate}. If you do not complete your task by this date, your case will be closed automatically.

Log into the Councillor Portal to confirm that the case is resolved or to update your case.

Do not reply to this email as you will not receive a response.

Reference number:
{case_ref}
","attachments":""}

Output_template:
{"subject":"Case updated - ({case_ref}) {subject}","fromName":"Councillor Portal","from":"noreply@brentwood.gov.uk","recipients_to":"{keepCouncillorsInformedSubform/councillorEmailAddress}","recipients_cc":"","recipients_bcc":"","pdf_attachments":"","body":"

{caseResolutionNotes}

@endaf:if

{category} - {serviceType}

Subject:
{subject}

Tags:
{concatenatedTags}

Do not reply to this email as you will not receive a response.

Reference number:
{case_ref}
","attachments":""}
